entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard with multiple faces.

entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is possessed by Voldemort.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: unicorn blood
entities.description: A substance that has strengthened Voldemort.

entities.name: elixir of life
entities.description: A potion that will allow Voldemort to create a body of his own.

entities.name: stone in your pocket
entities.description: An object that Harry possesses and Voldemort wants.

relationships.description: Voldemort needs the Elixir of Life to create a body of his own.
Harry possesses the Stone in his pocket.
